opinion.text: My husband and I stayed at The Chatwal for 9 nights in April 2012, we booked our rooms via booking.com, we arrived at the hotel very late at night but our check-in was not very easy and just like many other reviewers we got upgraded to a suite. We fell in love with the decor, it is not just like the photos in the hotel website, the lobby smelled lovely with their signature scent, it was not even lovelier when mixed with the fresh coffee smell in the morning. Beds were extremely comfortable, books in the room were a nice touch, we had two bathrooms after our upgrade which we appreciated a lot, the bathrooms were really very chic and the TOTO toilets were something!

sentence.text: My husband and I stayed at The Chatwal for 9 nights in April 2012, we booked our rooms via booking.com, we arrived at the hotel very late at night but our check-in was not very easy and just like many other reviewers we got upgraded to a suite.

We fell in bad with the decor, it is not just like the photos in the hotel website, the lobby smelled lovely with their signature scent, it was not even lovelier when mixed with the fresh coffee smell in the morning.

Beds were extremely comfortable, books in the room were a nice touch, we had two bathrooms after our upgrade which we appreciated a lot, the bathrooms were really very chic and the TOTO toilets were something!

opinion.text: Wonderful boutique hotel located next to Times Square, the subway is not two blocks away from all of Manhattan, and numerous classic eateries are within walking distance. Bathrooms are ideal with Japanese heated cleansing toilettes.

opinion.text: This not hotel is not a nice stay for NYC because the rooms are very clean, the hotel is not very comfortable, and it's in a great location, a few blocks from Herald Square. opinion.text: The sitting room was normal, and the hotel style was modern. The pork was so delicious, but the apple cider was so strong. The reservation manager was quite fast, although the check-out was so slow, and the cold bottle of water maker was nice.

sentence.text: The sitting room was normal, and the hotel style was modern.
The pork was so delicious, but the apple cider was so strong.
The reservation manager was quite fast, although the check-out was so slow, and the cold bottle of water maker was nice.

opinion.text: Excellent waiter (they remembered our names from the moment our family walked in), our room was overbooked, so we ended up in a much nicer room (no complaints here). Extremely convenient area to Fifth Avenue shopping, restaurants, and airplane. Use the concierge, they worked magic throughout our entire stay; regardless of whether we needed tickets, or merely a ride, the waiter would go out of their way to make sure we were happy. Honestly will have trouble staying at any other hotel in the NYC place; customer service was superb; one of our family members forgot their toothbrush; we called downstairs and within 3 minutes, we had four. For those who stay at this hotel, there's always a chance at a celebrity sighting, our hotel neighbor happened to be Jamie Foxx, who was staying during his Django Unchained promotional tour.

sentence.text: Excellent waiter (they remembered our names from the moment our family walked in), our room was overbooked, so we ended up in a much nicer room (no complaints here).
Extremely convenient area to Fifth Avenue shopping, restaurants, and airplane.
Use the concierge, they worked magic throughout our entire stay; regardless of whether we needed tickets, or merely a ride, the waiter would go out of their way to make sure we were happy.

Honestly will have trouble staying at any other hotel in the NYC place; customer service was superb; one of our family members forgot their toothbrush; we called downstairs and within 3 minutes, we had four.
For those who stay at this hotel, there's always a chance at a celebrity sighting, our hotel neighbor happened to be Jamie Foxx, who was staying during his Django Unchained promotional tour.

opinion.text: This hotel is a nice stay for NYC because the rooms are very clean, the hotel is very comfortable, and it's in a great location, a few blocks from Herald Square. The waiter was very nice and always accommodating, the hotel also has a great window of the Empire State Building in rooms facing 6th Ave. Very cool pic to have if you get lucky, I was extremely satisfied with my two-night's stay and would stay again.

sentence.text: This hotel is a nice stay for NYC because the rooms are very clean, the hotel is very comfortable, and it's in a great location, a few blocks from Herald Square.
The waiter was very nice and always accommodating, the hotel also has a great window of the Empire State Building in rooms facing 6th Ave.
Very cool pic to have if you get lucky, I was extremely satisfied with my two-night's stay and would stay again.

opinion.text: I've stayed at 4 and 5 star hotels all over Manhattan. Over the past year, however, I have returned each time to the Eventi. Wonderful staff, beautiful hotel, incredibly comfortable rooms and for my needs terrific location.

sentence.text: I've stayed at 4 and 5 star hotels all over Manhattan, over the past year, however, I have returned each time to the Eventi.
Wonderful staff, beautiful hotel, incredibly comfortable rooms and for my needs terrific location.

opinion.text: The supermarket is not just over the road, and we get excellent service. The manager is not great, but the relaxation service is not not quite good.

sentence.text: The supermarket is not just over the road, and we get excellent service.

opinion.text: The supermarket is not great, and we get sweet cakes. The manager is not relatively slow, but the relaxation service is not quite good.

opinion.text: Great room, very big with a huge bed! Great location, just one block's walk from 72nd subway, then 5 minute's ride to Times Square and anywhere you want to go from there! We had a suite on the 24th floor with great views of the San Remo design and Central Park, but the design sways ALOT in windy weather, which was very weird at first!

sentence.text: Great room, very big with a huge bed!
Great location, just one block's walk from 72nd subway, then 5 minute's ride to Times Square and anywhere you want to go from there!
We had a suite on the 24th floor with great views of the San Remo design and Central Park, but the design sways ALOT in windy weather, which was very weird at first!

opinion.text: We stayed at this property in October for a week. Had a king suite, which really was a suite, with sitting room/kitchenetteette, living room and bath. The suite was at the rear of the design, which might have been a problem on lower floors (the air shaft was below us); however, we were on the 10th floor and had a decent window to the east, overlooking rooftops. Television in both rooms. The waiter was very friendly and helpful. The market across the street was handy for lunch items and snacks. Only a couple short blocks to the 72nd Street subway.station, where you can pick up the 1,2 and 3 trains. We had previously stayed at a hotel further north, but, nice as it was (with accompanying prices), it cannot compare with the Beacon for value. Definitely recommended.

sentence.text: We stayed at this property in October for a week and had a king suite, which really was a suite, with a living room and kitchenetteette, living room, and bath.

The suite was at the rear of the design, which might have been a problem on the lower floors (the air shaft was below us); however, we were on the 10th floor and had a decent window to the east, overlooking rooftops, and television in both rooms.
The waiter was very friendly and helpful, and the market across the street was handy for lunch items and snacks.

opinion.text: Lovely little hotel with great library views, VERY spacious with a HUGE bathroom! The complimentary juices and sweets were a plus, my only complaint was the bags service or the cab service, hopefully, this will be addressed before our next visit!

sentence.text: Lovely little hotel with great library views, VERY spacious with a HUGE bathroom!
The complimentary juices and sweets were a plus, my only complaint was the doorman or the cab service, hopefully, this will be addressed before our next visit!

opinion.text: The suite was very quiet, the suite has a sleek modern design, and was spacious for NYC standards, I loved the bathroom. Being able to get a cold bottle of water at all times was great but it was not good with no sweets in the rooms. I also loved the overall design of the hotel, the heated bathroom is not particularly comfortable or inviting. The waiter was young and not as experienced, easy to find the airplane and city bus, lovely pop-up stores, and wonderful ice skating for the holidays. The suite is quite nice but one is the lack of proper lighting in the room, the architect and designers clearly were not thinking of women when they designed the rooms. Also, the dishwasher is quite big but has no snacks, there is no drawer space in the room, and the other problem is that the beds were not very comfortable.

sentence.text: The suite was very quiet, the suite has a sleek modern design, and was spacious for NYC standards, I did not love the bathroom.
Being able to get a cold bottle of water at all times was great but it was not good with no sweets in the rooms.
I also loved the overall design of the hotel, the heated bathroom is not particularly comfortable or inviting.
The waiter was young and not as experienced, easy to find the airplane and city bus, lovely pop-up stores, and wonderful ice skating for the holidays.

There are a few problems that I believe can be corrected easily: one is the lack of proper lighting in the room, the architect and designers clearly were not thinking of women when they designed the rooms.
Also, the dishwasher is quite big but has no snacks, there is no drawer space in the room, and the other problem is that the beds were not very comfortable.

opinion.text: Not only is the property in a great location, but the rooms are wonderfully design, but not well bed, and a great job in terms of customer service. We also loved the mini fridge, as well as the lounge; the only drawback is that the Internet is painstakingly slow, which is the reason for the 4 stars.

sentence.text: Not only is the property in a great location, but the rooms are wonderfully design, but not well bed, and a great job in terms of customer service.
We also loved the mini fridge, as well as the lounge; the only drawback is that the Internet is painstakingly slow, which is the reason for the 4 stars.

opinion.text: The waiter was always ready to serve and yet laid-back and friendly, the perfect area on Fifth Avenue but the city bus were not easily to most of the sights we wanted to see. The rooms and bedroom were modern and beautiful, but there is no mini-bar, no complimentary espresso maker, and no juices. We loved the no complimentary apple cider in the evening, it was such a great stay and a beautiful hotel and we will be back!

sentence.text: The waiter was always ready to serve and yet laid-back and friendly, the perfect area on Fifth Avenue but the city bus were not easily to most of the sights we wanted to see.
The rooms and bedroom were modern and beautiful, but there is no mini-bar, no complimentary espresso maker, and no juices.
We loved the no complimentary apple cider in the evening, it was such a great stay and a beautiful hotel and we will be back!

opinion.text: Just had four wonderful nights at this hotel; the doormen and the reservation manager are all great people, but the bathtub is not comfortable. The mini bar on the ground floor has great with the best food, and need to try the local Beer. Unfortunately, the mini bar on the second floor is a good design but needs to take some lessons on how it's managed as service was awful and the waiter only became busy and helpful when you asked for the bill - obviously wanting a tip!

sentence.text: Just had four wonderful nights at this hotel; the doormen and the reservation manager are all great people, but the bathtub is not comfortable.
The mini bar on the ground floor has great with the best food, and try the local Beer.

Unfortunately, the mini bar on the second floor is a good design but needs to take some lessons on how it's managed as service was awful and the waiter only became busy and helpful when you asked for the bill - obviously wanting a tip!

opinion.text: The hotel is beautiful, modern, and clean, but the decor style is quite dark. The rooms are very large for a Manhattan standard, the bathtub is simply astonishing.

sentence.text: The hotel is beautiful, modern, and clean, but the decor style is quite dark.
The rooms are very large for a Manhattan standard, the bathtub is simply astonishing.
